description: Creates a new mobile device access rule for the specified WorkMail organization.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization under which the rule will be created.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The idempotency token for the client request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Effect
parameters.description: The effect of the rule when it matches. Allowed values are ALLOW or DENY.

parameters.name: DeviceTypes
parameters.description: Device types that the rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceTypes
parameters.description: Device types that the rule will not match. All other device types will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: DeviceModels
parameters.description: Device models that the rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceModels
parameters.description: Device models that the rule will not match. All other device models will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: DeviceOperatingSystems
parameters.description: Device operating systems that the rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceOperatingSystems
parameters.description: Device operating systems that the rule will not match. All other device operating systems will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: DeviceUserAgents
parameters.description: Device user agents that the rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceUserAgents
parameters.description: Device user agents that the rule will not match. All other device user agents will match. (string) ---

nested_items.name: MobileDeviceAccessRuleId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the newly created mobile device access rule.
